reviewText: I watched Oh Heavenly Dog several times in the past and was excited to see it combined with two additional dog stories

I bought this triple feature because it had Oh heavenly Dog In It and it is a rare DVd to find. I like Far From Home also, but have not tried watching Rusty as it seemed more of a juvenille type movie.
  Oh Heavenly Dog stars Benji which one enver hears about these days, but used to be a popular animal star. A young Chevy Chase and Jane Seymour make this movie outstanding and the ending is really good. I would highly recommend it.

I purchased this triple feature, only for the "Oh Heavenly Dog" movie that I remember watching many years ago.  It is over 30 years old and is one of many in my collection of good movies, that I would watch over and over again.  The other two in this selection I still have not watch, so I can not comment on them, good or bad.
I am very happy to have Oh Heavenly Dog to add to my Chevy Chase collection, the other two movies are added bonus. I paid a good price and the quality is good too.

I selected this item because I was looking for "Oh Heavenly Dog" and it came with two other movies which I considered a wild card bonus.

"Oh Heavenly Dog" is probably the best of the Benji movies, with well-known human actors Chevy Chase, Jane Seymour & Omar Sharif, and a compelling story line that holds the viewer's interest.  Alone, I would rate this film 5 stars.

"Far From Home" was pretty average 'boy and dog have an adventure in the wilderness' family fare.  Pleasant enough but nothing remarkable.

But I was really quite appalled at the production quality of "Rusty the Great Rescue".  Despite featuring well-known actors in both human and voice-over form, it looked like it was made on someone's back 40 over a long weekend, and to say the dialogue was trite and stilted would be kind.  I have yet to meet a real live child who talks the way these two do.  I don't think I'll be watching this one again!
THIS SET HAS 3 SEPERATE DISCS FOR THE 3 MOVIES.A Dog's Life 3 Pack (Because of Winn-Dixie / Oh! Heavenly Dog / Far From Home)
